title: Riot, you may want to know about this (Funny Ascension interaction)

embed.description: Discover & Share this Wtf GIF with everyone you know. GIPHY is how you search, share, discover, and create GIFs.

body:
So this just happened guys.
I dunno, I guess it proves that Teemo is Satan if anything...

replies.body: wonder if it works with {{champion:27}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:74}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:96}} any one who can deal damage after death
well now donger for the win xD
I guess it would have to
I killed Xerath with Zyra passive and all it did was crash my game. We won tho so it might have revived me I don't know.
This is how it has always worked... anyone who played Ascension the first time it was out would know this.
